title: How do  I use USB tethering in Windows Vista and Windows 7ï¼Ÿ
answer:
Connect the phone to the PC using a USB cable. Windows 7 or Windows Vista will install the driver automatically.

Touch Settings > Wireless & networks > Tethering & portable hotspot > USB tethering. Check the network adapters and the network and sharing center.  
You can now browse the Internet on your PC using your phone to access the data network..
